summary: A man and his brother on a mission of revenge become trapped in a harrowing occult experiment dating back to the Third Reich.
cast: Henry Cavill|Dominic Purcell|Emma Booth|Michael Fassbender|Rainer Winkelvoss|László Mátray|Joy McBrinn|Shea Whigham|Tony Barger|Douglas Roger|Michael Ntumba|Razvan Oprea|Ana Popescu|Florin Piersic Jr.|Gerard McSorley|Vlad Voda|Albert Gherasim|Lynn Collins|Matthew Benson|Andreea Perminov|Gabrielle Downey|Andrew Begg|Adolf Hitler|Wentworth Miller
title: La masacre de Town Creek
